title: Film Scoring Tools Serene Underscores
description: Inside you’ll find 120 restful soundscapes, relaxing loops, immersive melodic keys, bass arps, calming synth swells, subtle driving drums & rhythms, one shots and a variety of essential samples for creating inspiring ethereal & cinematic music.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo

Inside you’ll find 120 restful soundscapes, relaxing loops, immersive melodic keys, bass arps, calming synth swells, subtle driving drums & rhythms, one-shots, and a variety of essential samples for creating inspiring ethereal & cinematic music.

Film Scoring Tools: Serene Underscores is a cross-genre sample pack and creates professional tracks ranging in the following styles: Spa Music, Rest & Relaxations, Chill, Ambient, Cinematic, Soundscape, Drone as well as other modern ambient music genres.

Perfect for creating hopeful moments, inspiring moods, thought-provoking emotions & more. Explore through a rich catalog of production-ready Ambient loops & one-shots. Easily find the perfect sample as everything is organized into understandable folders & meticulously key tagged. We’ve added Soundminer metadata into the samples to help you find the find right sound at the right time.

All files are Royalty-Free and supplied to you in high-quality 48k/16bit audio file format that can be used in the most popular samplers, DAWs, and plugins with drag & drop plugin features.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 120 loops & one-shots
  • 80 ambient music loops & elements
  • 40 ethereal stabs, swells, pad one-shots
  • 780.2 MB of calm samples
  • All in high-quality 48k/16bit .wav file format
  • All files tagged with key, form, & type
  • Ambient moods & cinematic loops, one-shots for film productions
  • Everything you need to build emotion-filled soundtracks & scenes
  • Long dreamy pads, reveals & loops
  • Beautiful soundscape loops
  • Rhythmic arps & drum loops
  • Delicate melodies, pulsing swells
  • Melodic dreamy keys, calm plucks
  • Emotional string reveals, title screen logos & much more!
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • All files form, key & bpm labeled
  • 100% Royalty-Free
  • Compatible with PC/Mac and all DAW’s


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 48k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some

Minutes of audio provided: 45

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
